channel.title: A problem with item stats
channel.description:
I just got a new source, and I went about adding various things to get it up to scratch. But, when I added the Godswords, I put the stats in the Item.CFG as I normally would, but when I equip the item, it doesn't give the stats that I set. Does anyone know why?
Many thanks,
Syrillia. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: 21-12-2007, 19:44:31[/size][hr]Common, someone must know.
